name: Fix The Circuit
description:
You are a mechanic in a futuristic cyber world, and several futuristic car circuits have been fried, you should rewire them.
This is a simple game, made for my friends [Aurélio melo, Ruan Pablo, Guilherme Corrêa and Guilherme Lopes].
It was really fun to do it, since it was more for study.

Musics made by Stevia Sphere (http://steviasphere.bandcamp.com)
